TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AutomationElementCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementCollection> is used as the return type for methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.FindAll%2A>. It is not intended to be used for application-defined collections, for which you should use a more generic class such as <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>.
